backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user management, party master records, and CRUD operations for party payment entries.
backend/migration.mo: Placeholder migration module returning an empty new actor with no migration logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to their related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries of key frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that forces light mode before React loads and mounts the root app container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapped in AuthGate with tab navigation for entry, listing, and reports, plus a header and footer.
frontend/src/features/auth/AccountSummar: User account dropdown showing initials, profile info, and a sign‑out action using Internet Identity hooks.
frontend/src/features/auth/authApi.ts: React Query hooks for fetching user profile and role, checking admin status, and mutating registration and profile data.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Auth wrapper determining whether to show login, registration, loading states, or the main app based on identity and user data.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginScreen.t: Login screen UI that triggers Internet Identity authentication and displays biometric info and errors.
frontend/src/features/auth/RegistrationS: User registration flow managing steps for account creation, profile setup, and completion with error handling.
frontend/src/features/partyPayments/comp: Shows a loading alert with a spinner while the backend actor initializes.
Provides a confirmation dialog for deleting a payment entry with a loading state.
Displays a dialog containing a form for editing an existing payment entry.
Generates a sanitized, user‑friendly error message by redacting sensitive data.
frontend/src/features/partyPayments/dueT: Utility functions for checking if a payment is due today and formatting phone numbers.
frontend/src/features/partyPayments/part: Parses Excel files into PartyMaster records with header normalization and warnings.
Handles localStorage persistence and lookup utilities for PartyMaster records.
frontend/src/features/partyPayments/Part: Combobox for selecting or typing party names with search, sorting, and party selection callbacks.
Displays, filters, sorts, edits, deletes, and exports party payment entries with actor connection handling.
Form for creating or editing payment entries, supporting party master import, geolocation, validation, and success states.
Renders the party payment report UI with filtering, printing, and CSV/PDF export options.
frontend/src/features/partyPayments/part: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on payment entries and party masters using the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/partyPayments/repo: Exports payment entries to a downloadable CSV file with proper cell escaping.
Generates a payment report PDF using dynamically loaded jsPDF and autotable, formatting entries into a styled table with headers and footers.
frontend/src/features/partyPayments/type: Defines TypeScript interfaces for party payment form data, entries with metadata, and party master records.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading identities, and handling login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, CSS variables for themes, and print-specific styling rules.
frontend/src/jspdf.d.ts: Placeholder TypeScript declaration file for jsPDF.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/theme/forceLightMode.ts: Utility that removes and prevents re-adding the dark class to enforce light mode via MutationObserver.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, clearing, and manipulating URL and session-stored parameters.
frontend/src/xlsx.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for the xlsx library, describing workbook, worksheet, parsing, and writing utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining content paths, dark mode, container settings, extended fonts, colors, radii, shadows, and animations with several plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing new authentication, authorization, and biometric login requirements, including known issues and pending feature requests.
